MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:08pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50pm on Monday, 26th April 2021
